name: My Gems!
description:
Based on the game: Game Of Nim. My Gems! brings a new version of the long lost game. In this game you are battling against your opponents to steal their gems. The game can be played with a friend or pick one of the AI's implemented within the game. Lots of fun to be had and try to find new techniques to quickly steal those gems. Have fun and get rich in My Gems!. 

Please give feedback in the comments. 

Follow me on twitter for more upcoming content and sneak peeks: @BrillliantFrame
